snippet: Some “Big Brother” contestants who are using ethnic and sexist slurs have stirred up viewers and the CBS network.
abstract: Some contestants on 2013 season of reality show Big Brother are using ethnic and sexist slurs that have stirred up viewers and CBS network; controversy reignites debate over whether show's producers are appropriately and fairly depicting real life in their quest to provoke and entertain viewers.
lead_paragraph: Some “Big Brother” contestants who are using ethnic and sexist slurs have stirred up viewers and the CBS network.

headline.seo: On ‘Big Brother,’ Racial and Gay Slurs Abound
headline.main: Reality Show Contestants Pay a Real-World Price
headline.print_headline: Reality Show Contestants Pay a Real-World Price
